page.title: 20A HELICOPTER PILOT-COVENTRY.
page.content: {06.00}Gets up, has wash,has breakfast. {06.45}Goes upstairs and dresses. {07.00}Cleans boots,makes sandwiches. {07.10}Sets off for work in Mercedez. {08.00}Arrives at work. {08.01}Checks helicopter for faults. {09.00}Takes boss for beakfast - Paris. {10.00}Gets back from Paris. {10.20}Takes first customer to his destination. {13.00}Brings back another customer. {13.30}Has his lunch. {14.00}Starts his paper work. {15.00}Returns for first customer. {15.30}Returns to England. {15.55}Lands at work. {15.56}Has coffee,goes to toilet. {16.00}Gets back in helicopter and flys second customer back. {17.00}Sets off home in car. {17.50}Goes in front door. {17.55}Collapses into chair for sleep.
